Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.communication

Class CommunicationHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.communication.CommunicationHub
  • public class CommunicationHub
extends java.lang.Object
    A CommunicationHub represents the intermediate class between a ClientCommunicationInterface and the more abstract Player. This class collects all the NetworkMessages received from the Server and process them. Messages that does not compete to it, are forwarded to the corresponding Player. Also the CommunicationHub is responsible for the continuous connection check for each client connected. After a disconnection has been detected, the proper procedures of logout and unregistration is performed in order to guarantee the integrity of this ecosystem.

      private static CommunicationHub instance
      The CommunicationHub unique instance.
      private LobbyManager lobbyManager
      A reference to the LobbyManager responsible for the Lobby handling.
      private java.util.Queue<Player> players
      A List of all the Players connected to te Server.

      • getPlayerByName

        private Player getPlayerByName​(java.lang.String name)
                        throws PlayerNotFoundException
        Returns a Player that corresponds to the given name, if any.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Player to find.
        Returns:
        the Player whose name corresponds to the given name.
        Throws:
        PlayerNotFoundException - if no Player can be found whose name matches the given name;

      • register

        private boolean register​(Player player)
                  throws ClientAlreadyRegisteredException
        Register the given Player into the Server.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to be registered.
        Returns:
        true if the Player was already found into the Server and is has simply rejoined, false if the Player is a new one.
        Throws:
        ClientAlreadyRegisteredException - if another Player with the same name of the Player given has already been registered to the Server.

      • unregister

        private void unregister​(Player player)
                 throws ClientNotRegisteredException
        Unregister the given Player from the Server.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to be unregistered.
        Throws:
        ClientNotRegisteredException - if no Player whose name equals the name of the given Player has been previously registered into the Server.

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method is the core of all the CommunicationHub logic. it is called every time the underlying network level receives a NetworkMessage from the remote Client. Its only task is to classify the message received and forward it to the corresponding handler method.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be classified.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleRegistration

        private void handleRegistration​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type REGISTER_REQUEST. It is responsible for the proper registering procedure of the NetworkMessage author into the Server.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleUnregistration

        private void handleUnregistration​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type UNREGISTER_REQUEST. It is responsible for the proper unregistering procedure of the NetworkMessage author out of the Server.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleUpdateRequest

        private void handleUpdateRequest​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type LOBBY_UPDATE_REQUEST. It is responsible for the correct send of the updated Lobby list to the NetworkMessage author.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleLobbyCreation

        private void handleLobbyCreation​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type LOBBY_CREATE_REQUEST. It is responsible for the proper creation of a new Lobby. All the information needed are stored into the message content field.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleLobbyLogin

        private void handleLobbyLogin​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type LOBBY_LOGIN_REQUEST. It is responsible for the proper login of the NetworkMessage author into the Lobby whose name can be found into the given message.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • handleLobbyLogout

        private void handleLobbyLogout​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type LOBBY_LOGOUT_REQUEST. It is responsible for the proper logout procedure of the NetworkMessage author.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • sendOpponentsUpdate

        private void sendOpponentsUpdate​(Player player)
        This method is responsible for the proper send of the updated list of Players in the same lobby of the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to send the update to.

      • sendTimerUpdate

        private void sendTimerUpdate​(Player player)
        This method is responsible for the proper send of the updated timer countdown to each Player in the same Lobby of the given player.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player whose Lobby has been chosen to receive the countdown update.

      • notifyPlayer

        private void notifyPlayer​(NetworkMessage message)
        This method handles the NetworkMessages of type CLIENT_MESSAGE. It is responsible for the correct forward of the given NetworkMessage to the Player counterpart of the message author.
        Parameters:
        message - the NetworkMessage to be handled.
        See Also:
        MessageType

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage​(Player player,
                         NetworkMessage message)
        Sends a given NetworkMessage to the remote Client referenced to the given Player.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player whose remote client is desired to be sent the NetworkMessage to.
        message - the NetworkMessage to be sent to the remote Client.
